Text: ANTIFA isn't an organization.ANTIFA has NEVER killed a single person.ANTIFA simply means "anti-fascism," it's a fairly small, highly decentralized movement.What Trump is trying to do is label anyone who speaks out against him a terrorist, which is what all dictators do.
